name: A GRIM DEAL.
description:
You are The Reaper.

You will consume all souls before you, however some fools will offer you a deal.
You will consume these souls last!

---
Drag and drop. 
M = Mute
H = Help
R = Reset Level
---

Made for Trijam 124.

*By Mallardbro.
*ASCII Reaper found here.

---

  • Yep, that's not how you spell "Resilience".
  • Yeah, the audio does weird things on some/all? browsers.
  • Yep, there's no endless mode. I really wanted one, and have a handwritten plan for it! ...Perhaps a post-jam update.
